page.title: 19Local Superstitions (2)
page.content: {The Unfortunate Bride. Outside{Butleigh Wootton}there is a place called{Butleigh Court.}The family who lived there had a daughter who was to be married.The wedding was held at{Butleigh Court.}At the end of the wedding the bride said she would like to play hide and seek,so she went up in to the attic where she found a tin trunk. She got inside and closed down the lid. Then she realised that it would not close and she could not get out.The groom found all the guests but not the bride.In fact no-one ever found her until{Butleigh Court was being changed into flats.Two workmen went up to the attic and found the tin trunk.The men opened it and found in side a{skeleton}wearing a wedding dress.
